pr_title: Issue #4954 - Expose header size/length from HttpParser

timeline.bodyText: _headerBytes is an int and it make no sense to every have header size that needs a long.
timeline.author: gregw

replies.bodyText:
Yeah, I see that now.
Guess I just institutionally made it a long to match the .getContentLength() return value.
I'll change it.
replies.author: joakime

timeline.message:
Issue #4954 - Expose header size/length from HttpParser

- Minimal new API for exposing byte counts to HttpChannel.

Signed-off-by: Joakim Erdfelt <joakim.erdfelt@gmail.com>
